m_szDocSumamry: South Australia Aims For 100% Renewable Energy December 11th, 2015 by Giles Parkinson   Originally published on RenewEconomy . South Australia is expected to pass its 50 per cent renewable energy target next year – nearly a decade ahead of schedule – and the Labor government will now aim to get the state as close to 100 per cent renewable energy as possible.
